extension.summary: Listen to music, watch videos and view photos from your Google Drive account
extension.description: Plays music and video from your Google Drive account. Not affiliated with Google.

extension.news: - update reddit video resolver - fix m3u8 check missing urls with parameters - add shout: to direct play - filter .css - remove unused dialog
extension.summary: Find and resolve media from a url to play or open.
extension.description:
PlayThis will attempt to find and resolve* media from a url to play or open. A history list is available for future use, exporting to .m3u/.strm** and sending to a remote PlayThis add-on. Supports video, audio, images and executable***. * resolves using URLResolver and youtube-dl ** exported .m3u/.strm is only usable in Kodi w/ PlayThis installed *** 'executable' items are urls with potential results available through scraping
Companion browser extension available on the Chrome Web Store and Mozilla's AMO Gallery
Artwork by @konsumer420
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Esse Add-on pertence a BUILD TONYWARLLEY, se você instalou esse add-on e não possui a BUILD TONYWARLLEY, está correndo sério risco de ter seu dispositivo infectado por VÍRUS, não baixe Add-ons que não sejam Oficial, Add-ons Oficiais somente no CANAL TONY WARLLEY TUTORIAIS.

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.
Use this addon to play F4m v1 and v2 streams
